name: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
description:
Press the arrow keys on your desktop to move around and -press > to talk to the characters. 

This game is a parody of the cult Bollywood movie Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge and spins the statement by the chief patriarch of the family, "Ja Jee Le Apni Zindagi" (Live Your Life) to Simran, the female protagonist. In the movie, Simran finally lives her life by eloping with the hero, Raj and getting married. This game subverts the ending and reimagines possible (and preferable) endings for Simran.

Music Credits: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b1DxrAyvqpA
